law.catch_line: Access of Parole Board to youthful offender and reports.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 626, effective July 15, 1998; and ch. 443, sec. 25, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 145, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 350, sec. 108, effective April 10, 1988. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 423, sec. 143, effective July 1, 1987.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/98). This statute has been amended by 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 443 (making a substantive nonrevisory change) and ch. 426 (which made a name change due to reorganization and is revisory in nature). The nonrevisory change prevails. KRS 7.136(3).
